name: Transaction entry details

testSteps.description: 1: Transaction entry details ({Detail=Status, Description=The presentation or hashing operations status (Completed or Failed)})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user views a transaction entry
Then a card is displayed for each transaction entry including Status and The presentation or hashing operations status (Completed or Failed)

testSteps.description: 2: Transaction entry details ({Detail=Relying Party, Description=The relying party name})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user views a transaction entry
Then a card is displayed for each transaction entry including Relying Party and The relying party name

testSteps.description: 3: Transaction entry details ({Detail=Datetime, Description=The datetime of the transaction as follows:})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user views a transaction entry
Then a card is displayed for each transaction entry including Datetime and The datetime of the transaction as follows:

testSteps.description: 4: Transaction entry details ({Detail=Datetime, Description=X minutes ago for transactions in the last 60 minutes})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user views a transaction entry
Then a card is displayed for each transaction entry including Datetime and X minutes ago for transactions in the last 60 minutes

testSteps.description: 5: Transaction entry details ({Detail=Datetime, Description=Time (e.g., 11:07 AM) for transactions within the day})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user views a transaction entry
Then a card is displayed for each transaction entry including Datetime and Time (e.g., 11:07 AM) for transactions within the day

testSteps.description: 6: Transaction entry details ({Detail=Datetime, Description=Datetime (e.g., 14 Feb 2024 11:07 AM) for transactions before today})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user views a transaction entry
Then a card is displayed for each transaction entry including Datetime and Datetime (e.g., 14 Feb 2024 11:07 AM) for transactions before today

userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to access the EUDI Wallet screen having organized all my transactions
  So that I can view and search the attestation presentations and document signing operations I performed with my EUDI Wallet

title: Transaction entry details

values: The presentation or hashing operations status (Completed or Failed)
The datetime of the transaction as follows:
X minutes ago for transactions in the last 60 minutes
Time (e.g., 11:07 AM) for transactions within the day
Datetime (e.g., 14 Feb 2024 11:07 AM) for transactions before today

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
When the user views a transaction entry
Then a card is displayed for each transaction entry including <Detail> and <Description>
